27044.title: Oct 9 - Thunder Bay (McKeller) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
27044.summary:
Affected Area: Thunder Bay

Affected Services: Internet, Business Internet, Phone, Business Phone, Digital TV, VOD, Gateway, BlueCurve TV, WiFi Access Points

Reference Number: INC0850992

Summary: Some customers in the McKeller area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Live Updates:

10/09/2020 20:18 ET We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
